article: The purpose of students  _  come to school is to study. But  to study  needs the right way or we would waste the time or the money. The followings are ways for studying. The  _  time for reading is morning. Because in the morning, the air is fresh and our mind are clear. For that reason, we can get good results When we study we must be patient . If we don't understand a test well, We must read it again. We should not read the next  _  we have learned the first one well. When we are studying we must put our hearts  _  the book. We can not read absent-mindedly , or we could get  _  from the book while we are reading. We must always ask "why". If it is not  _  understand, write it down ask our teacher or parents, brothers or friends, in  _  possible way We must know it completely and then our knowledge can be  Be used  well. Though there many ways of studying,  _  , the above mentioned be quite enough if we can keep it in heart.
